code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Routes,Route}from'react-router-dom';import axios from'axios';import Header from'./components/Header';import CategoriesMenu from'./components/CategoriesMenu';import FilterSearch from'./components/FilterSearch';import CarList from'./components/CarList';import CarDetailPage from'./components/CarDetailPage';import LoginPage from'./components/LoginPage';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[cars,setCars]=useState([]);const[filteredCars,setFilteredCars]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/cars/').then(response=>{setCars(response.data);setFilteredCars(response.data);}).catch(error=>{console.error('Ошибка при загрузке машин:',error);});},[]);const handleCategorySelect=category=>{const filtered=cars.filter(car=>car.brand.toLowerCase().includes(category.toLowerCase()));setFilteredCars(filtered.length?filtered:[]);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CategoriesMenu,{onSelectCategory:handleCategorySelect}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FilterSearch,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CarList,{cars:filteredCars})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/car/:id",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CarDetailPage,{cars:cars})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/login",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoginPage,{})})]})]});}export default App;
